modName: Breakable Circlets for Loot and Degradation
summary: Lets your headwear degrade even if you use a mod like Helmet Toggle to turn helmets into circlets.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=5]What does it do?
[/size][/b][color=#cccccc]Normally Loot and Degradation doesn't check for items to break in the circlet slot, so helmets turned into circlets by mods like Helmet Toggle won't degrade. This mod contains a small script edit to make sure they do.[/color]


[b][size=5]How do I install it?
[/size][/b][color=#cccccc]Place the provided "scripts" folder in your skyrim/data folder, or install it with a mod manager of your choice. Overwrite the existing Loot and Degradation scripts.[/color][color=#cccccc]
[/color]

---


[b]Credits:
[/b][color=#cccccc][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2463371/?]Isoku[/url] for a fantastic mod. The scripts are edited and uploaded with permission.[/color]

[b]Requirements:
[/b][color=#cccccc][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55677/?]Loot and Degradation[/url] by isoku[/color]

[b]Recommended:[/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22765/?]Helmet Toggle[/url][color=#cccccc] by maniczombie, or any other invisible helmet mod that turns helmets into circlets.[/color]
